Definition: You will be given a sentence in English. You need to provide the sentiment of the sentence based on its empathetic direction. There are two possible classifications: positive (happy) or negative (offmychest).

Positive Examples.input: was down for a long time , wanted to show off what changed all that , my mermaid hair .
Positive Examples.explanation: This is considered positive sentiment since the speaker disjuncts "was down for a long time" with their new changed hair insinuating a positive sentiment; therefore, it is correctly classified.

Positive Examples.input: i hate working . i know most people feel the same way . i just absolutely hate working 40 hours a week . i feel like i ’m wasting my life away at work . i hate it . i ’d rather do so many other things . after i graduated undergrad , i went back to school after a year because i hated working full time . after graduating with my masters , i still hate working .
Positive Examples.explanation: In this example, it would be classified as negative sentiment because the context speaker uses strong negative connotative words such as "hate", "wasting", "rather", etc; so, it is classified correctly

Negative Examples.input: i have spent more than half my life biting my nails as an anxiety coping mechanism . today it 's exactly 3 months since i 'd stopped . it makes me so happy and proud and i have no one else to share it with .
Negative Examples.explanation: In this context, it is not correctly classified as the speaker mentions extreme feelings of happiness after stopping a negative habit and use of the word "proud"

Negative Examples.input: i hate . i hate that i feel in love with the person i consider my best friend . i hate the fact that i know the only way i can stop having stop these feelings is to completely remove her from my life . i hate the fact that its going that its going to hurt us . i hate that i 've to come to this decision
Negative Examples.explanation: This example is incorrectly classified as positive; whereas, it should be classified as positive because the speaker uses strong negatively-connotated words such as "hate", "stop", "remove", and "hurt".

Instances.input: do i have breast cancer ? i know this might'nt be the best site to be posting this , but i recently found a lump in my left breast . it is very red , is growing quickly , causes tingles and hurts like fuck , whether i 'm touching it or not . i 'm only 17 and cancer does not run in my family . i do n't smoke or drink alcohol , any advice ?
i feel pretty good for once . yup . that 's all .
one year ago today i proposed , in a treehouse near the beach , to the love of my life . this photo was taken just before it happened . i ’ve never been happier !

when you finally get up the courage to go to therapy ... .... to fix the feeling of being let down all the time by people its not a good feeling when your therapist does n't show up and assumes you wo n't make it to the appointment because there was snow two days ago . i 'm not irresponsible .. i would have called . oh well :) i will stick with self help books they 've helped me so far !
my friends wanted to see the aqueduct , so we set out on an epic ride to find it . i had only been there once , years before , when another friend took me . i was so happy to find it again !

i 'm high and for the first time in my life i feel attractive with my shirt off ! i just smoked a massive joint of the best weed i 've ever smoked , then spent an hour and a half dealing with my ridiculous amount of body hair . looked in the mirror and for the first time i was proud of what i saw , off to a party later and i feel fantastic = d

i 've been in a crippling depression since the end of my 6 year relationship . a friend asked if i could be their date to " a boring awards ceremony " . they tricked me with a surprise award ! it has no monetary value but it gives me genuine joy .
i told her . i was so scared of rejection , so afraid i would ruin our friendship , but i finally did it and she felt the same way too . i 've never been so happy in my life
